testCases.title: Test Cases
testCases.description: Manage and track test cases for your projects
testCases.noTestCasesDescription: Get started by creating your first test case or uploading a CSV file with existing test cases.
testCases.csvUploadDescription: Upload a CSV file containing test cases to bulk import them into your project.
testCases.csvFormatNote: CSV should contain columns: title, description, priority, status, steps, expected_result
testCases.uploadError: Error uploading CSV file. Please check the format and try again.

testPlans.title: Test Plans
testPlans.description: Create and manage test execution plans
testPlans.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop test cases to organize execution order

traceabilityMatrix.title: Traceability Matrix
traceabilityMatrix.description: Track coverage and relationships across your SDLC

hero.description: Manage, Design, Requirements, Testing, Defects, KPIs, Traceability and Automate Requirements Design, Test Cases with your AI Assistant. Automation, Performance and Compatibility Testing are not forgotten either.

domain.noCreditCard: No credit card required for free plan
